name: Tutorial - Building responsive websites with Locofy
description:
Learn how to build responsive websites with Figma and Locofy!


This hands-on tutorial will teach you step-by-step how to generate responsive frontend code from your Figma design.


You will learn how to maximize the power of Figma's autolayout, combining it with the functionality of Locofy's plugin.


Make sure to install the Locofy plugin to convert your design into production-ready code:

► Get the plugin

► Watch Demo

► Check out Locofy Guide
